name: Glory Of Eternity
description:
Glory of Eternity is a fantasy MMORPG , inspired by Korean MMORPG. 
You play as a hero in the game and make your way to become stronger. 

You will get Quests from the NPCs which rewards you with Experience, Items, Access to Dungeons and Maps .

There were special quests and normal ones, with special quests revealing a bonus cinematic upon completion.

There are many monsters and bosses to hunt in vast open world with multiple apps.

Current version of the game is just out of prototype stage and into Network testing.
This version is for Supporter from Patreon which help in the further development of the game.

Glory of Eternity of being made an one man Indie Studio at this time.

You can Support Us on Patreon :Support Glory of Eternity on Pateron

Note :

At this time server is only up during the testing.
